mapper.insert: insert into person ( person_id, person_name, person_sex, person_birthday, person_email, person_password) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select person_password as password from person where person_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
